1: וְעַתָּ֞ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָמַ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>But now thus saith</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> בֹּרַאֲךָ֣ <sup>1254 </sup> <n>that created</n> יַעֲקֹ֔ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>thee O Jacob</n> וְיֹצֶרְךָ֖ <sup>3335 </sup> <n>and he that formed</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>thee O Israel</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּירָא֙ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>Fear</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> גְאַלְתִּ֔יךָ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>not for I have redeemed</n> קָרָ֥אתִי <sup>7121 </sup> <n>thee I have called</n> בְשִׁמְךָ֖ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>[thee] by thy name</n> לִי־ אָֽתָּה׃ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n>
2: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> תַעֲבֹ֤ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>When thou passest through</n> בַּמַּ֙יִם֙ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>the waters</n> אִתְּךָ־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> אָ֔נִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> וּבַנְּהָר֖וֹת <sup>5104 </sup> <n>I [will be] with thee and through the rivers</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יִשְׁטְפ֑וּךָ <sup>7857 </sup> <n>they shall not overflow</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> תֵלֵ֤ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>walk</n> בְּמוֹ־ <sup>1119 </sup> <n>through</n> אֵשׁ֙ <sup>784 </sup> <n>the fire</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> תִכָּוֶ֔ה <sup>3554 </sup> <n>thou shalt not be burned</n> וְלֶהָבָ֖ה <sup>3852 </sup> <n>neither shall the flame</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> תִבְעַר־ <sup>1197 </sup> <n>kindle</n> בָּֽךְ׃
3: כִּ֗י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֲנִי֙ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> קְד֥וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>the Holy One</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> מוֹשִׁיעֶ֑ךָ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>thy Saviour</n> נָתַ֤תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>I gave</n> כָפְרְךָ֙ <sup>3724 </sup> <n>[for] thy ransom</n> מִצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>Egypt</n> כּ֥וּשׁ <sup>3568 </sup> <n>Ethiopia</n> וּסְבָ֖א <sup>5434 </sup> <n>and Seba</n> תַּחְתֶּֽיךָ׃ <sup>8478 </sup> <n>your place</n>
4: מֵאֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>you</n> יָקַ֧רְתָּ <sup>3365 </sup> <n>Since thou wast precious</n> בְעֵינַ֛י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in my sight</n> נִכְבַּ֖דְתָּ <sup>3513 </sup> <n>thou hast been honourable</n> וַאֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>and I</n> אֲהַבְתִּ֑יךָ <sup>157 </sup> <n>and I have loved</n> וְאֶתֵּ֤ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>thee therefore will I give</n> אָדָם֙ <sup>120 </sup> <n>men</n> תַּחְתֶּ֔יךָ <sup>8478 </sup> <n>your place</n> וּלְאֻמִּ֖ים <sup>3816 </sup> <n>for thee and people</n> תַּ֥חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>exchange</n> נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>for thy life</n>
5: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּירָ֖א <sup>3372 </sup> <n>Fear</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִתְּךָ־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> אָ֑נִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> מִמִּזְרָח֙ <sup>4217 </sup> <n>from the east</n> אָבִ֣יא <sup>935 </sup> <n>not for I [am] with thee I will bring</n> זַרְעֶ֔ךָ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>thy seed</n> וּמִֽמַּעֲרָ֖ב <sup>4628 </sup> <n>thee from the west</n> אֲקַבְּצֶֽךָּ׃ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>and gather</n>
6: אֹמַ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>I will say</n> לַצָּפוֹן֙ <sup>6828 </sup> <n>to the north</n> תֵּ֔נִי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Give up</n> וּלְתֵימָ֖ן <sup>8486 </sup> <n>and to the south</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּכְלָ֑אִי <sup>3607 </sup> <n>Keep not back</n> הָבִ֤יאִי <sup>935 </sup> <n>bring</n> בָנַי֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>my sons</n> מֵרָח֔וֹק <sup>7350 </sup> <n>from far</n> וּבְנוֹתַ֖י <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and my daughters</n> מִקְצֵ֥ה <sup>7097 </sup> <n>from the ends</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n>
7: כֹּ֚ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>[Even] every one</n> הַנִּקְרָ֣א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>that is called</n> בִשְׁמִ֔י <sup>8034 </sup> <n>by my name</n> וְלִכְבוֹדִ֖י <sup>3519 </sup> <n>him for my glory</n> בְּרָאתִ֑יו <sup>1254 </sup> <n>for I have created</n> יְצַרְתִּ֖יו <sup>3335 </sup> <n>I have formed</n> אַף־ <sup>637 </sup> <n>even</n> עֲשִׂיתִֽיו׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>him yea I have made</n>
8: הוֹצִ֥יא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>Bring forth</n> עַם־ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> עִוֵּ֖ר <sup>5787 </sup> <n>the blind</n> וְעֵינַ֣יִם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>eyes</n> יֵ֑שׁ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>that have</n> וְחֵרְשִׁ֖ים <sup>2795 </sup> <n>and the deaf</n> וְאָזְנַ֥יִם <sup>241 </sup> <n>that have ears</n> לָֽמוֹ׃
9: כָּֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> הַגּוֹיִ֞ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>Let all the nations</n> נִקְבְּצ֣וּ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>be gathered</n> יַחְדָּ֗ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> וְיֵאָֽסְפוּ֙ <sup>622 </sup> <n>be assembled</n> לְאֻמִּ֔ים <sup>3816 </sup> <n>and let the people</n> מִ֤י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> בָהֶם֙ יַגִּ֣יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>who among them can declare</n> זֹ֔את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>to us</n> וְרִֽאשֹׁנ֖וֹת <sup>7223 </sup> <n>the former</n> יַשְׁמִיעֻ֑נוּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>this and shew</n> יִתְּנ֤וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>add</n> עֵֽדֵיהֶם֙ <sup>5707 </sup> <n>their witnesses</n> וְיִצְדָּ֔קוּ <sup>6663 </sup> <n>that they may be justified</n> וְיִשְׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>or let them hear</n> וְיֹאמְר֥וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> אֱמֶֽת׃ <sup>571 </sup> <n>[It is] truth</n>
10: אַתֶּ֤ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>You</n> עֵדַי֙ <sup>5707 </sup> <n>Ye [are] my witnesses</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וְעַבְדִּ֖י <sup>5650 </sup> <n>and my servant</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> בָּחָ֑רְתִּי <sup>977 </sup> <n>whom I have chosen</n> לְמַ֣עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>that</n> תֵּ֠דְעוּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>that ye may know</n> וְתַאֲמִ֨ינוּ <sup>539 </sup> <n>and believe</n> לִ֤י וְתָבִ֙ינוּ֙ <sup>995 </sup> <n>me and understand</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> ה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>I am He</n> לְפָנַי֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>that I [am] he before</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> נ֣וֹצַר <sup>3335 </sup> <n>formed</n> אֵ֔ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>me there was no God</n> וְאַחֲרַ֖י <sup>310 </sup> <n>neither shall there be after</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will be none</n> יִהְיֶֽה׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> ס
11: אָנֹכִ֥י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> אָנֹכִ֖י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>I [even] I [am] the LORD</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and there</n> מִבַּלְעָדַ֖י <sup>1107 </sup> <n>and beside</n> מוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>me [there is] no saviour</n>
12: אָנֹכִ֞י <sup>595 </sup> <n>is I</n> הִגַּ֤דְתִּי <sup>5046 </sup> <n>I have declared</n> וְהוֹשַׁ֙עְתִּי֙ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>and have saved</n> וְהִשְׁמַ֔עְתִּי <sup>8085 </sup> <n>and I have shewed</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and there</n> בָּכֶ֖ם זָ֑ר <sup>2114 </sup> <n>when [there was] no strange</n> וְאַתֶּ֥ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> עֵדַ֛י <sup>5707 </sup> <n>[god] among you therefore ye [are] my witnesses</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וַֽאֲנִי־ <sup>589 </sup> <n>and I</n> אֵֽל׃ <sup>410 </sup> <n>that I [am] God</n>
13: גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Even</n> מִיּוֹם֙ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>Yea before the day</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> ה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>I am He</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and there</n> מִיָּדִ֖י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>out of my hand</n> מַצִּ֑יל <sup>5337 </sup> <n>[was] I [am] he and [there is] none that can deliver</n> אֶפְעַ֖ל <sup>6466 </sup> <n>I will work</n> וּמִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>and who</n> יְשִׁיבֶֽנָּה׃ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and who shall let</n> ס
14: כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֧ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> גֹּאַלְכֶ֖ם <sup>1350 </sup> <n>your redeemer</n> קְד֣וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>the Holy One</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לְמַעַנְכֶ֞ם <sup>4616 </sup> <n>your sake</n> שִׁלַּ֣חְתִּי <sup>7971 </sup> <n>For your sake I have sent</n> בָבֶ֗לָה <sup>894 </sup> <n>to Babylon</n> וְהוֹרַדְתִּ֤י <sup>3381 </sup> <n>and have brought down</n> בָֽרִיחִים֙ <sup>1281 </sup> <n>all their nobles</n> כֻּלָּ֔ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> וְכַשְׂדִּ֖ים <sup>3778 </sup> <n>and the Chaldeans</n> בָּאֳנִיּ֥וֹת <sup>591 </sup> <n>[is] in the ships</n> רִנָּתָֽם׃ <sup>7440 </sup> <n>whose cry</n>
15: אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>I [am] the LORD</n> קְדֽוֹשְׁכֶ֑ם <sup>6918 </sup> <n>your Holy One</n> בּוֹרֵ֥א <sup>1254 </sup> <n>the creator</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> מַלְכְּכֶֽם׃ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>your King</n> ס
16: כֹּ֚ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> הַנּוֹתֵ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>which maketh</n> בַּיָּ֖ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>in the sea</n> דָּ֑רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>a way</n> וּבְמַ֥יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>waters</n> עַזִּ֖ים <sup>5794 </sup> <n>in the mighty</n> נְתִיבָֽה׃ <sup>5410 </sup> <n>and a path</n>
17: הַמּוֹצִ֥יא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>Which bringeth forth</n> רֶֽכֶב־ <sup>7393 </sup> <n>the chariot</n> וָס֖וּס <sup>5483 </sup> <n>and horse</n> חַ֣יִל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>the army</n> וְעִזּ֑וּז <sup>5808 </sup> <n>and the power</n> יַחְדָּ֤ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> יִשְׁכְּבוּ֙ <sup>7901 </sup> <n>they shall lie down</n> בַּל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>not</n> יָק֔וּמוּ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>they shall not rise</n> דָּעֲכ֖וּ <sup>1846 </sup> <n>they are extinct</n> כַּפִּשְׁתָּ֥ה <sup>6594 </sup> <n>as tow</n> כָבֽוּ׃ <sup>3518 </sup> <n>they are quenched</n>
18: אַֽל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּזְכְּר֖וּ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>Remember</n> רִֽאשֹׁנ֑וֹת <sup>7223 </sup> <n>ye not the former things</n> וְקַדְמֹנִיּ֖וֹת <sup>6931 </sup> <n>the things of old</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּתְבֹּנָֽנוּ׃ <sup>995 </sup> <n>neither consider</n>
19: הִנְנִ֨י <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> עֹשֶׂ֤ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Behold I will do</n> חֲדָשָׁה֙ <sup>2319 </sup> <n>a new thing</n> עַתָּ֣ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> תִצְמָ֔ח <sup>6779 </sup> <n>now it shall spring forth</n> הֲל֖וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תֵֽדָע֑וּהָ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>shall ye not know</n> אַ֣ף <sup>637 </sup> <n>will even</n> אָשִׂ֤ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>it? I will even make</n> בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <sup>4057 </sup> <n>in the wilderness</n> דֶּ֔רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>a way</n> בִּֽישִׁמ֖וֹן <sup>3452 </sup> <n>in the desert</n> נְהָרֽוֹת׃ <sup>5104 </sup> <n>[and] rivers</n>
20: תְּכַבְּדֵ֙נִי֙ <sup>3513 </sup> <n>shall honour</n> חַיַּ֣ת <sup>2416 </sup> <n>The beast</n> הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n> תַּנִּ֖ים <sup>8577 </sup> <n>me the dragons</n> וּבְנ֣וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>first</n> יַֽעֲנָ֑ה <sup>3284 </sup> <n>and the ostriches</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> נָתַ֨תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>because I give</n> בַמִּדְבָּ֜ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>in the wilderness</n> מַ֗יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>waters</n> נְהָרוֹת֙ <sup>5104 </sup> <n>[and] rivers</n> בִּֽישִׁימֹ֔ן <sup>3452 </sup> <n>in the desert</n> לְהַשְׁק֖וֹת <sup>8248 </sup> <n>to give drink</n> עַמִּ֥י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>to my people</n> בְחִירִֽי׃ <sup>972 </sup> <n>my chosen</n>
21: עַם־ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> זוּ֙ <sup>2098 </sup> <n>This</n> יָצַ֣רְתִּי <sup>3335 </sup> <n>have I formed</n> לִ֔י תְּהִלָּתִ֖י <sup>8416 </sup> <n>my praise</n> יְסַפֵּֽרוּ׃ <sup>5608 </sup> <n>for myself they shall shew forth</n> ס
22: וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֹתִ֥י <sup>853 </sup> קָרָ֖אתָ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>But thou hast not called</n> יַֽעֲקֹ֑ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>upon me O Jacob</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יָגַ֥עְתָּ <sup>3021 </sup> <n>but thou hast been weary</n> בִּ֖י יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of me O Israel</n>
23: לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> הֵבֵ֤יאתָ <sup>935 </sup> <n>Thou hast not brought</n> לִּי֙ שֵׂ֣ה <sup>7716 </sup> <n>me the small cattle</n> עֹלֹתֶ֔יךָ <sup>5930 </sup> <n>of thy burnt offerings</n> וּזְבָחֶ֖יךָ <sup>2077 </sup> <n>me with thy sacrifices</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> כִבַּדְתָּ֑נִי <sup>3513 </sup> <n>neither hast thou honoured</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> הֶעֱבַדְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>I have not caused thee to serve</n> בְּמִנְחָ֔ה <sup>4503 </sup> <n>with an offering</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> הוֹגַעְתִּ֖יךָ <sup>3021 </sup> <n>nor wearied</n> בִּלְבוֹנָֽה׃ <sup>3828 </sup> <n>thee with incense</n>
24: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> קָנִ֨יתָ <sup>7069 </sup> <n>Thou hast bought</n> לִּ֤י בַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <sup>3701 </sup> <n>with money</n> קָנֶ֔ה <sup>7070 </sup> <n>me no sweet cane</n> וְחֵ֥לֶב <sup>2459 </sup> <n>me with the fat</n> זְבָחֶ֖יךָ <sup>2077 </sup> <n>of thy sacrifices</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> הִרְוִיתָ֑נִי <sup>7301 </sup> <n>neither hast thou filled</n> אַ֗ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>Rather</n> הֶעֱבַדְתַּ֙נִי֙ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>but thou hast made me to serve</n> בְּחַטֹּאותֶ֔יךָ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>with thy sins</n> הוֹגַעְתַּ֖נִי <sup>3021 </sup> <n>thou hast wearied</n> בַּעֲוֹנֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>me with thine iniquities</n> ס
25: אָנֹכִ֨י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> אָנֹכִ֥י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> ה֛וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>who</n> מֹחֶ֥ה <sup>4229 </sup> <n>I [even] I [am] he that blotteth out</n> פְשָׁעֶ֖יךָ <sup>6588 </sup> <n>thy transgressions</n> לְמַעֲנִ֑י <sup>4616 </sup> <n>sake</n> וְחַטֹּאתֶ֖יךָ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>thy sins</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and I will not</n> אֶזְכֹּֽר׃ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>for mine own sake and will not remember</n>
26: הַזְכִּירֵ֕נִי <sup>2142 </sup> <n>Put me in remembrance</n> נִשָּׁפְטָ֖ה <sup>8199 </sup> <n>let us plead</n> יָ֑חַד <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> סַפֵּ֥ר <sup>5608 </sup> <n>declare</n> אַתָּ֖ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> לְמַ֥עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>because of</n> תִּצְדָּֽק׃ <sup>6663 </sup> <n>thou that thou mayest be justified</n>
27: אָבִ֥יךָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>father</n> הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <sup>7223 </sup> <n>Thy first</n> חָטָ֑א <sup>2398 </sup> <n>hath sinned</n> וּמְלִיצֶ֖יךָ <sup>3887 </sup> <n>and thy teachers</n> פָּ֥שְׁעוּ <sup>6586 </sup> <n>have transgressed</n> בִֽי׃
28: וַאֲחַלֵּ֖ל <sup>2490 </sup> <n>Therefore I have profaned</n> שָׂ֣רֵי <sup>8269 </sup> <n>the princes</n> קֹ֑דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>of the sanctuary</n> וְאֶתְּנָ֤ה <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and have given</n> לַחֵ֙רֶם֙ <sup>2764 </sup> <n>to the curse</n> יַעֲקֹ֔ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>Jacob</n> וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>and Israel</n> לְגִדּוּפִֽים׃ <sup>1421 </sup> <n>to reproaches</n> ס
